name: Ocean Avenue
description:
Ocean Avenue is a visual novel detailing the lives of five college students, figuring out what they want to do with their lives. They bond together through the sport of volleyball. Depending on how you play your cards, this could be in more ways than one! ;)

The story will have a great focus on their athletic journeys, and how it affects their career choices. All of them have expectations from family, mentors, etc. that will leave an impact their choices. However, you can make a difference! You play as Evan, a transfer student from the suburbs who recently arrived at University of San Vicente, a big-city university right along on the ocean.

Feel free to leave your thoughts and opinions in the comments below! You can also leave feedback for me on this Google Forms survey: https://forms.gle/94iRhD3k3foXcbHo9. After every update release, the previous update's responses get saved into a spreadsheet, and get cleared from the existing Google Form to make it easier to read through the new update's responses.

The visual novel does not have a concrete update schedule at the moment, but Patrons will have access to early releases 7 days before the public release. Here is a link to that: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=19921505

I will expand this section once the update schedule is more concrete.
